title: note.delete Request Application Programming Interface (API) Schema
description: Deletes a Note from a **DB Notefile** by its Note ID. To delete Notes from a `.qi` Notefile, use `note.get` or `note.changes` with `delete:true`.

file.description: The Notefile from which to delete a Note. Must be a Notefile with a `.db` or `.dbx` extension.

note.description: The Note ID of the Note to delete.

verify.description: If set to `true` and using a templated Notefile, the Notefile will be written to flash immediately, rather than being cached in RAM and written to flash later.

samples.title: Delete Note from DB Notefile
samples.description: Delete a specific Note by ID from a database Notefile.

samples.title: Delete Note with Verification
samples.description: Delete a Note and write to flash immediately for a templated Notefile.

samples.title: Delete Note with Command
samples.description: Delete a Note using command syntax (no response expected).
